accuracy.description: The degree to which the provided answer matches the correct information.

completeness.description: The extent to which all parts of the answer are provided.

reasoning_traceability.description: How easily the reasoning and steps taken to reach the answer can be followed and understood.

timeliness.description: The amount of time taken to provide the final answer.

data_confidentiality.description: Ensuring the answer does not include sensitive or private data that should not be disclosed.

uniqueness.description: The degree to which the answer or solution is not easily found or replicated elsewhere, indicating a custom solution.

diversity_of_steps.description: The range of different steps or methods used by agents in the multi-agent system to solve the task.

correctness_of_methodology.description: The appropriateness and correctness of the approach and methods used to solve the task.

responsiveness_to_user_input.description: How well the system responds to the user's inputs or redirections during the task.

clarity_of_communication.description: How clear and understandable the communications are from the agents to the user.
